title: Christmas remake 2
content:
A week late, exactly on schedule; [url=http://levellord.toxicsheep.com/Chris.zip]levellord.toxicsheep.com/Chris.zip[/url]

Its the Commander Keen christmas graphics remake [with a few patches and minor level tweaks by Sarah] and plenty of ripped graphics.

Play it now or be forever doomed to a slow agonizing death!A proud member of the Spleen Extinction society

[img]http://img.photobucket.com/albums/v410/Gannalev/rcwn.png[/img]

"No one should be here."
-Levellord

title: Re: Christmas remake 2
content:
[quote]Quote:[hr]Play it now or be forever doomed to a slow agonizing death![hr][/quote]

Ooohhh... Difficult Choice...


Anyway, I Downloaded it and spent a couple of minutes playing.

Very good, love the title artwork, and the whole game is very keeny.

Although it seems oddly similar to keen 2...We want Keen 7
[url=http://kevan.org/brain.cgi?MultiMANIA]We want it now![/url]

title: Re: Christmas remake 2
content:
